author: xinbenlv
content: why is this block containing zero tx https://etherscan.io/block/15009290?does it mean some miners are not as incentivized enough to mine blocks with tx?

author: ralexstokes
content: miners can not pack blocks -- this pool didn't for some reason; i'm guessing it may be more of a bug than an explicit choice

author: timbeiko
content: there's something about PoW where it's worth it for miners to start trying to build a block before adding transactions to it in case they find a PoW solution quickly given they get the 2ETH reward

author: timbeiko
content: so 0 txn blocks are often the result of that. I don't think you ever see, say, 1 txn blocks

author: sky.cactus
content: Sudden base fee upswings can also in theory lead to empty blocks, but I don't think I have ever seen this happen.
